author: oheger
msg: Some special methods of XMLConfiguration now call the Synchronizer correctly.

author: oheger
msg: FileHandler now takes care for synchronization.
If the associated FileBased object implements the SynchronizerSupport
interface, the object is locked during load and save operations.

author: oheger
msg: Use internal methods when loading and saving a PropertiesConfiguration instance.
This avoids that for each property to be loaded or saved the configuration's

author: oheger
msg: Made SynchronizerTestImpl public, so that it can be used for test classes in other packages, too.
